info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu, MIT
info.abstract: The Featuretools-MOOCdb< component using an entity set extracts features from a MOOCdb database.
info.description:
MOOCdb TSV Files:
assessments.tsv - assement_id
observed_events.tsv - observed_events_id
problems.tsv - problem_id
submissions.tsv - submission_id
users.tsv - user_id

MOOCdb Relationships:
users - user_id - observed_events - user_id
users - user_id - submissions - user_id
problems - problem_id - submissions - problem_id
submissions - submission_id - assessments - submission_id

ul.li: MOOCdb inputs file location: contains all of the required tsv files.
